member.name: T:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Column
member.summary: Represents a column in a database table. This class is used to define the properties of a column, including its ID, name, data type, and other attributes.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Column.ColumnID
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the column.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Column.TableID
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the table to which this column belongs.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Column.DBColumnName
member.summary: Gets or sets the actual name of the column in the database.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Column.AdminColumnName
member.summary: Gets or sets the user-friendly name for the column.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Column.DataType
member.summary: Gets or sets the data type of the column (e.g., varchar, int).

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Column.IsNullable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column allows null values.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Column.AdminDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets the description provided by the admin for the column.

member.name: T:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database
member.summary: Represents a database connection in the system with comprehensive details

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.DatabaseID
member.summary: Unique identifier for the database connection

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.Name
member.summary: Name of the database connection

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.TypeID
member.summary: Type ID of the database (Foreign key to DatabaseTypes)

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.ServerAddress
member.summary: Server address for the database connection

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.DatabaseName
member.summary: Actual name of the database

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.Port
member.summary: Port number for the database connection

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.Username
member.summary: Username for database authentication

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.EncryptedCredentials
member.summary: Encrypted credentials for secure storage

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.CreatedAt
member.summary: Timestamp of database connection creation

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.CreatedBy
member.summary: User ID of the creator

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.Description
member.summary: Description of the database connection

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.IsActive
member.summary: Indicates if the database connection is active

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.LastTransactionDate
member.summary: Timestamp of the last transaction

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.LastConnectionStatus
member.summary: Indicates the last connection status

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.DBCreationScript
member.summary: Database creation script

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.ConnectionString
member.summary: Connection string for the database

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Database.DatabaseTypeName
member.summary: Type name of the database (not a database column, but useful for display)

member.name: T:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.DatabaseException
member.summary: Custom exception for database operations

member.name: T:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.ExceptionDetails
member.summary: Represents the details of an exception that occurs within the application.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.ExceptionDetails.ErrorCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a unique code for the error.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.ExceptionDetails.Message
member.summary: Gets or sets a human-readable error message.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.ExceptionDetails.Details
member.summary: Gets or sets additional details about the error (optional).

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.ExceptionDetails.Timestamp
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp of when the error occurred.

member.name: T:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Query
member.summary: Represents a SQL query and its associated metadata.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Query.QueryID
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the query.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Query.QueryText
member.summary: Gets or sets the SQL query string.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Query.ExecutedAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp when the query was executed.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Query.ExecutedBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the user ID of the person who executed the query. Nullable.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Query.DatabaseType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of database where the query was executed (e.g., SQLServer, MySQL, Oracle).

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Query.Result
member.summary: Gets or sets the serialized result of the query execution. Optional, for logging purposes.

member.name: T:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryComparison
member.summary: Represents a comparison between different SQL query results generated from natural language questions.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryComparison.DbSchema
member.summary: Gets or sets the database schema.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryComparison.NaturalLanguageQuestion
member.summary: Gets or sets the natural language question.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryComparison.GptSqlQuery
member.summary: Gets or sets the SQL query generated by GPT.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryComparison.DeepSeekSqlQuery
member.summary: Gets or sets the SQL query generated by DeepSeek.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryComparison.DeepSeekChatSqlQuery
member.summary: Gets or sets the SQL query generated by DeepSeek Chat.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryComparison.GptDataResult
member.summary: Gets or sets the data result from the GPT SQL query.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryComparison.DeepSeekDataResult
member.summary: Gets or sets the data result from the DeepSeek SQL query.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryComparison.DeepSeekChatDataResult
member.summary: Gets or sets the data result from the DeepSeek Chat SQL query.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryComparison.GptVsDeepSeekChatComparison
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the GPT result is compared with the DeepSeek Chat result.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryComparison.DeepSeekVsDeepSeekChatComparison
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the DeepSeek result is compared with the DeepSeek Chat result.

member.name: T:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryRequest
member.summary: Represents a request to query a specific schema with a given question.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryRequest.Schema
member.summary: Gets or sets the schema to be queried.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryRequest.Question
member.summary: Gets or sets the question to be asked against the schema.

member.name: T:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Relationship
member.summary: Represents a relationship between tables in a dynamic dashboard system.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Relationship.RelationshipID
member.summary: Gets or sets the primary key of the relationship.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Relationship.TableID
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreign key to the source table.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Relationship.ColumnID
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreign key to the column in the source table.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Relationship.RelatedTableID
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreign key to the related table.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Relationship.RelatedColumnID
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreign key to the column in the related table.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Relationship.RelationshipType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of relationship (e.g., "One-to-Many", "Many-to-Many", "One-to-One").

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Relationship.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the relationship (for admin use).

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Relationship.IsEnforced
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the relationship is enforced by a database constraint.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Relationship.CreatedAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp for when the relationship was created.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Relationship.CreatedBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the user who created the relationship.

member.name: T:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Result
member.summary: Represents the result of an operation or a process. This class can be used to encapsulate the outcome of a method or function, including any relevant data or status information.

member.name: T:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Table
member.summary: Represents a table in the dynamic dashboard system. This class holds metadata about a database table, including its ID, the database it belongs to, its actual name in the database, a user-friendly name, and an admin-provided description.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Table.TableID
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the table.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Table.DatabaseID
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the database this table belongs to. This is a foreign key to the Database table.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Table.DBTableName
member.summary: Gets or sets the actual name of the table in the database.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Table.AdminTableName
member.summary: Gets or sets the user-friendly name for the table.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.Table.AdminDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets the description provided by the admin for the table.

member.name: T:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.TableMetadata
member.summary: Represents metadata information for a database table.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.TableMetadata.DBTableName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the database table.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.TableMetadata.AdminTableName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the admin table.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.TableMetadata.DBColumnName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the database column.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.TableMetadata.AdmincnName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the admin column.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.TableMetadata.DataType
member.summary: Gets or sets the data type of the column.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.TableMetadata.IsNullable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column is nullable.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.TableMetadata.IsPrimary
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column is a primary key.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.TableMetadata.IsFK
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column is a foreign key.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.TableMetadata.IsUnique
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column is unique.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.TableMetadata.DBDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the database column.

member.name: T:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.User
member.summary: The User class contains properties that define a user, including their ID, username, role, allowed databases, password hash, and creation date.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.User.UserID
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the user.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.User.Username
member.summary: Gets or sets the username of the user.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.User.RoleID
member.summary: Gets or sets the role ID associated with the user.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.User.AllowedDatabases
member.summary: Gets or sets the databases that the user is allowed to access.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.User.PasswordHash
member.summary: Gets or sets the hashed password of the user.

member.name: P:DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.User.CreatedAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time when the user was created.
